name: WireCompiler
summary: gRPC and protocol buffer compiler for Android, Kotlin, Java, and Swift.
prepare_command:
curl https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/com/squareup/wire/wire-compiler/4.7.2/wire-compiler-4.7.2-jar-with-dependencies.jar --output compiler.jar
if ! jar tf compiler.jar >/dev/null 2>&1; then
  echo "[WireCompiler] The compiler.jar file is invalid or corrupted."
  exit 1
fi
